attributes.action: push forward with removal of illegal immigrants and to insure that the law upholds the current legislation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many more will Britain let loose?  How many more will be caught then released with a date to come back to the station?  This country no longer cares for its own, young cannot consider council tenancy unless they are of ethnic background or a single mother.  The goverment helps illegal immigrants to live, start a life and get through the courts using British tax money.  For once Britain should finally say 'No more' and help her own, not other countries rejects.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
